testcase.name: DBA.TR02
testcase.description: DBA.TR02: gsd:IdentificationNumberCvrOfReportingEntity must have the absolute URI 'http://www.dcca.dk/cvr' as context entity identifier scheme.

variation.name: Invalid
variation.description: IdentificationNumberCvrOfReportingEntity entity identifier scheme is not http://www.dcca.dk/cvr
